t: TOPS Knives - Knife Center
s: TOPS Knives are tools designed and built using the extensive knowledge and real-life experiences of many operators with backgrounds in the military, law enforcement, outdoor professions, and martial arts. TOPS advanced tactical knives are the fine result of this synergism.

t: Amazon.com : Tops Knives BEST Fixed Blade Knife TP5020HP : Hunting Knives : Sports & Outdoors
s: I studied and researched Tops knives for months and months when I found the B.E.S.T. It was love at first sight. The knife comes with a nice survivor style sheath with a variety of carry options. Factory edge was nice but a Lansky sharpener/finisher made it razor sharp.
